metadata.name: One in a million
metadata.description: Speed, excitement, desire and uniqeness - the ultimate dream of the sophisticated. Someone who has long tasted all the joys of life. Someone who knows what he wants and knows how to claim it. The brightness of color, a storm of emotions and recognition awakens long-forgotten feelings in a person. Delight from what he saw, comfort and danger lead to rethinking and excites the mind. She catches the eye and halts the moment. With her, time is irrelevant. She is like an expensive woman: she thrills, adorns and growls. Her originality and novelty gives confidence on the road ahead. Next to her, the thirst for life wakes up, everything worldly becomes of no consequence. They started to build dwellings in the mountains, which were not affected by high temperatures. They adapted to such a life. However, gradually people weakened in body and dwindled in spirit, losing the remains of hope.
